## waitForReadyState() function

Create a `Promise` that will resolve once the document reaches the specified `readyState`<!-- -->, or immediately if it already has.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function waitForReadyState(state: DocumentReadyState): Promise<void>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

state


</td><td>

DocumentReadyState


</td><td>

The state to wait for.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
